column4: I've just downloaded and burned Ubuntu 7.04 on CDROM but It doesn't boot up with it, my boot sequence is ok. What did I do wrong here (I do get it started in windows) ?
are you sure that you have burned it as a bootable cd?
Ive just unpacked the iso and burned it on cd. is that correct?
dont unpack the iso-image, but burn the whole image!
